summary.title: YourPbFriend
summary.body: I was a Digital Marketer for YourPbFriend from 2014-2016. My team and I brought YourPbFriend.com to the #2 online Paintball retailer by sales from 2015-2016. We differentiated ourselves from the competition with an in-depth Paintball trade-in program featuring a robust rating system, high-quality photos/videos, and 30-day return policy. Our program is emulated by virtually every other online paintball retailer today.

brief: When I first joined the company in 2014, I was hired to help with both the website and marketing efforts. The company needed web development expertise as well as graphic design services to execute the founder's vision. This included several website feature additions and the advertisement of new features.

sections.title: Ecommerce Platform Selection
sections.body:
